title: Champ Shakur Stevenson joins the show!
description:
Shakur Stevenson joins the show coming off his big win over Oscar Valdez. The champ has been busy the past few months, find out what’s next for the boxing superstar. The Suns and Devin Booker send the Mavs to the brink …Jalen & Jacoby discuss the crafty guard and how he was able to fuel the big win but find out which player they are most concerned with going forward. Also, the Miami Heat took down the Philadelphia 76ers in a blowout win. Philly needs a lot of help if they think they’ll win game 6. Find out if the guys think it’s all over for the 76ers. All that and more.

itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
